typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BlogId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Disabled as boolean,
		DateCreated as timestamp,
		Key as string,
		Description as string,
		ImageUrl as string,
		ShortTitle as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLSource
source(output(
		PostId as integer,
		BlogId as integer,
		PostKey as string,
		DateCreated as string,
		DateEdited as string,
		Public as boolean,
		SeriesId as string,
		Title as string,
		ContentKey as string,
		Tags as string,
		CommentsEnabled as boolean,
		Deleted as boolean,
		DateDeleted as string,
		ReadTimeSeconds as integer,
		WordCount as integer,
		MetaDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
SQLSource, source1 join(SQLSource@BlogId == source1@BlogId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		BlogId = SQLSource@BlogId,
		DateCreated = source1@DateCreated,
		DateEdited,
		BlogKey = Key,
		{Blog Title} = SQLSource@Title,
		ShortTitle,
		Description,
		PostKey,
		Tags,
		{Post Title} = source1@Title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
